body: well, she made her own sufefering
i could do the same thing to the girl like this. fuck it.

I'm gonna call it right here and say there is no way his story can be vengeance worthy. Everybody else got tricked or screwed over, she was completely upfront about being a gold-digging whore for this guy and he just kept going after her like a desperate idiot even when had a better girl at work. There's no reason to be mad at her for this dude. It's not like they're officially BF/GF. Sure, it's scummy to use him for money, but girls do that all the time. She's not cheating on him or anything, just leading him on. Very different than say with her teacher and ruining his engagement... the same with the son of the pastor actually cheating on him and ruining his life. But this dude is 100% Betamax. So nope... I don’t feel sorry for him...
